author: yperbasis
content: <@!393119312350543872> <@!439556036647714817> About BerlinToLondonTransition in 9.0.0. Why is gasLimit=6283185 invalid at block 5? It's well within the 1/1024 delta from 2*3141592=6283184.

author: dimitry8570
content: Ah wait. I was checking that it strictly x2

author: yperbasis
content: According to eip-1559 is can be within 1/1024 of parent_gas_limit

author: dimitry8570
content: yes. I look at it now. and its quite a mess now. Oris tests failing

author: dimitry8570
content: but parentGasLimit is actually  multiplied too parent_gas_limit = self.parent(block).gas_limit * ELASTICITY_MULTIPLIER

author: dimitry8570
content: so it is withing 1/1024 of multiplied parent gasLimit
